remarks.format: ## Remarks This class object is internally created and used by the page parser when parsing a `<mobile:TextBox>` element. The TextBoxControlBuilder class parses the literal child text of the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextBox> to add it as the <xref:System.Web.UI.MobileControls.TextControl.Text%2A> property when the page is being parsed.
